summary.span: 命名空间提供命令树 API。

span.span: The namespace provides a command tree API.

remarks.format: ## Remarks API 用于创建表达式，由表示对象。The API is used to create expressions, which are represented by objects. 提供的 API 的命令目录树类具有以下特征：The command tree API provided by the class has the following characteristics: - 功能。Functional. 使用提供一种自然的构造流的功能模式构造的对象。 objects are constructed using functional patterns that provide a natural flow of construction. - 松散耦合。Loosely-coupled. A对象未绑定到任何特定的命令目录树，并可以在满足类型协议的任何上下文中使用。A object is not bound to any specific command tree and can be used in any context where type agreement is satisfied. - 不可变：Immutable. API 完全包含不可变类型;可能通过用新值替换时重新生成表达式树来模拟可变性。The API consists entirely of immutable types; mutability may be simulated by substituting new values while rebuilding an expression tree. -
